mapper.select: select sex from user_info where user_num = #{user_num}

select count(*) cnt from (select u.user_num, u.nickname, u.sex, u.user_img, u.birth, u.user_intro
, (s.sky_score + d.land_score) f_score, s.sky, s.sky_score, d.land, d.land_score
, m.score f_score, m.youmbti, m.score mbti_score
, (s.sky_score + d.land_score + m.score) f_score, m.youmbti, m.score mbti_score, s.sky, s.sky_score, d.land, d.land_score
from user_info u
,(select u.user_num, substr(u.ilju,1,1) sky, ds.sky_score from user_info u, daysky_score ds
where substr(u.ilju,1,1) = ds.msky and ds.wsky=(select substr(ilju,1,1) from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})
where substr(u.ilju,1,1) = ds.wsky and ds.msky=(select substr(ilju,1,1) from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})
) s,
(select u.user_num, substr(u.ilju,2,1) land, dl.land_score from user_info u, dayland_score dl
where substr(u.ilju,2,1) = dl.mland and dl.wland=(select substr(ilju,2,1) from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})
where substr(u.ilju,2,1) = dl.wland and dl.mland=(select substr(ilju,2,1) from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})
) d
,(select u.user_num, m.youmbti, m.score, m.mymbti from user_info u, mbtiscore m where u.user_mbti=m.youmbti and m.mymbti = (select user_mbti from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})) m
where u.user_num = m.user_num
where u.user_num=d.user_num and u.user_num=s.user_num
where u.user_num=d.user_num and u.user_num=s.user_num and u.user_num = m.user_num
and sex = #{sex}
and u.user_num != ${e}
)

select count(*) from (select u.user_num, u.nickname, u.sex, u.user_img, u.birth, u.user_intro

(select u.user_num, substr(u.ilju,2,1) land, dl.land_score from user_info u, dayland_score dl

where substr(u.ilju,2,1) = dl.wland and dl.mland=(select substr(ilju,2,1) from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})
) d
,(select u.user_num, m.youmbti, m.score, m.mymbti from user_info u, mbtiscore m where u.user_mbti=m.youmbti and m.mymbti = (select user_mbti from user_info where user_num = #{user_num})) m
where u.user_num = m.user_num
where u.user_num=d.user_num and u.user_num=s.user_num
